TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1922: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1928), 3 vols., Vol 2, pp. 90
TEI.2.document_title: Stephen F Austin to George Orr, 08-11-1828

barker_notes.barker_summary: Austin to George Orr, August 11, 1828. Passing on to him the order for arrest of certain fugitives wanted in the United States. (Omitted.)
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 90

div1.p: Austin to George Orr, August 11, 1828. Passing on to him the order for arrest of certain fugitives wanted in the United States. (Omitted.)
